Judul: A Research on Interior Color Design
Abstrak:
The proper use of colors is of great significance in interior design due to the aesthetic 
effect it adds to the interior buildings, the pychological and physiological enjoyable pleasure it 
brings to the house owner with its function of beautifying the interior environment, as well as its 
indication of the owner’s personality, his cultural background and aesthetic taste. Therefore, the 
author of this paper endeavors to make a brief analysis of three color components used in interior 
design in terms of their basic implications and their variations. Besides, the common problems of 
color application and the application of colors to interior design are also explored into depth in this paper.
Kata Kunci: the application of colors; interior color design; a esthetic effect; individuality; collocation
Sumber: Applied Mechanics and Materials Vols. 641-642 (2014) pp 1101-1104 Submitted: 25.06.2014 © (2014) Trans Tech Publications, Switzerland
